interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Biutee Starry Sky Nail Gel Firework Nail Gel With black Nail Polish Gel 8ml UV LED
Review Date: 2020/08/27
Store: Biutee
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Biutee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '3.5274 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 3.31 x 1.77 inches; 4.59 Ounces'}
Review Text: You will need base and top coat and a scooper/brush tool. They are not included. It took 3 coats of the black polish (included) to get full, dark coverage.  The pots are messy to open and quite small, but colors are pretty and sparkly.  Lots of glitter effect with multiple coats.  You will need a brush as well.  The finish feels bumpy (you can feel the glitter).  Maybe multiple top coat would help but I didn't want more layers since I already had base, 3 layers of color, 2 layers of glitter and a top coat.
Review Title: Pots are kinda messy. No base, top coat or brush.  Glitter is pretty.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Wonder4 Electric Callus Remover - Rechargeable Electric Foot File Callus Shaver Hard Skin Remover Pedicure Tools with 3 in 1 Roller Heads, for Cracked Heels Calluses and Dead Skin Wonder4 {'Brand': 'Wonder4', 'Is Electric': 'Yes', 'Item Form': 'Roller', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Unit Count': '11.4 Ounce'} I do like that the 3 different grit rollers can be flipped right on the head. It is quiet. I charged it several hours before using it, but it began lagging quickly. I plugged it in and kept using it and didn't notice much difference while plugged in. The description recommend only use 2 or 3 seconds at a time but I didn't find any reason why it would say that. It wasn't very powerful, but I did see a considerable amount of very fine skin. It didn't collect in the little tray that I could tell. It claims to work wet or dry. I will leave the wet testing to someone with less candles on their cake than I. My feet felt better after using.
I believe there are better ones than this at a competitive price point. It did work so I have to give it at least 3 ☆☆☆. It was quiet so that's a plus. The charge cord is very short. It's quiet. Not super powerful ZOCONE 10 Packs Boho Headbands for Women Girls, Turban Headwraps for Sports Yoga Running Workout, Elastic Fashion Hair Band (A) ZOCONE {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Fabric Type': 'Polyester,Silk', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Brand': 'ZOCONE', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 4.41 x 2.83 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'j158'} Nothing but good to say about this item. The bands were soft fabric, tight enough to hold hair back but not so tight it felt constricting. Several patterns and colors to match about any solid color top. Slipped into place easily and stayed there. I am pleased with this item's quality and variety. Soft fabric. Well constructed. Stays in place. Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'} The light is small and shallow. Thumb has to cure separately. This "complete" kit is not exactly complete. It has a micro USB cord but no box. Very basic nstructions. No times noted for curing. No color included. Assuming I cured for the correct time, I had a couple nails that smudged off when I wiped with alcohol. Most didn't. Top coat is exceptionally shiny. I have other Red Carpet items that I'm quite pleased with. This kit fell a bit short on expectations. As a starter kit, it's one you'll have to add a few things to (file, USB box, nail color, etc.) so be aware of that. The Purify cleaner has a light scent, but is a small bottle. I like the top coat. Kit is decent but not great. Not exactly a starter kit Biutee Starry Sky Nail Gel Firework Nail Gel With black Nail Polish Gel 8ml UV LED Biutee {'Brand': 'Biutee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '3.5274 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.92 x 3.31 x 1.77 inches; 4.59 Ounces'} You will need base and top coat and a scooper/brush tool. They are not included. It took 3 coats of the black polish (included) to get full, dark coverage. The pots are messy to open and quite small, but colors are pretty and sparkly. Lots of glitter effect with multiple coats. You will need a brush as well. The finish feels bumpy (you can feel the glitter). Maybe multiple top coat would help but I didn't want more layers since I already had base, 3 layers of color, 2 layers of glitter and a top coat. Pots are kinda messy. No base, top coat or brush. Glitter is pretty.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Category Preference**: The user maintains a strong preference for personal care tools, particularly in foot care and pedicure, while also exploring fashion accessories like headbands. Their recent interactions further underscore a deepening interest in nail care products, spurred by recent purchases.

- **Performance Expectations**: They seek comprehensive kits that fully meet initial needs, particularly appreciating items that cover all essentials, such as base and top coats. The recent review highlights their expectation for complete functionality within nail care offerings.

- **Features Importance**: Quiet operation remains crucial while they continue to prioritize customizable fit and aesthetic appeal. Their latest feedback indicates a desire for products with improved usability, as messy packaging was noted as a drawback.

- **Value Sensitivity**: The user exhibits careful comparison across products to ensure performance aligns with pricing. This value scrutiny now encompasses nail care items, reaffirming their critical approach towards cost-effectiveness.

- **Positive Experiences**: While they recognize quality craftsmanship, the user’s expectations have risen, particularly regarding product completeness and user-friendliness. 

- **Long-term Use**: They prefer products that demonstrate durability and reliable performance. The user's emphasis on quality and thoroughness reflects their desire for high-performing items that fulfill long-term usability across personal care and fashion categories.

Overall, the user's evolving engagement with nail care products aligns with their established preferences for practicality, quality, and a comprehensive user experience.
